result.eng: The smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.
result.ga: dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn sí
result.orig: dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn sí
result.html: dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn síThe smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.
result.ponchtml: dá laġad an t-ualaċ atá uirṫi is sásta a ḃíonn síThe smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.

result.eng: That's right but they won't believe us.
result.ga: is fíor sin ach ní chreidfidh siad muid
result.orig: is fíor sin ach ní chreidfidh siad muid
result.html: is fíor sin ach ní chreidfidh siad muidThat's right but they won't believe us.

result.eng: That's no help.

result.orig: ní aon chabhair é
result.html: ní aon chabhair éThat's no help.
result.ponchtml: ní aon ċaḃair éThat's no help.

result.eng: That's the end of the story, my friends.

result.eng: That's something you don't see often, a girl who drinks beer.
result.ga: sin rud nach bhfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoir

result.eng: That's the same person.
result.ga: sin é an duine céanna
result.orig: sin é an duine céanna
result.html: sin é an duine céannaThat's the same person.

result.eng: That's human nature.

result.eng: Now, that's three euros ten cents total, please.

result.eng: That's none of your business!

result.orig: ní bhaineann sin leat
result.html: ní bhaineann sin leatThat's none of your business!

result.eng: [Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.

result.orig: sin Úna sin niamh ansin muiris tá seisean i lár báire ansin fiona agus mise ar deireadh

result.eng: Do you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.
